title.text: Feel the Convenience of This 2BR/1BA Apt. with a Laundry Facility!

content: 2  bedroom 1 bath 845Sq.Ft. $2,495/mo  * Unit 128 - Available Now * Unit 116 - Available 03/08/18 Lawrence Road Apartments  CALL US TODAY:  show contact info

x266 Want more information? http://unit-availability.com/lead/8g1352186732/floorplan/2354000/1?extnId=7671623 DESCRIPTION:  Take this chance to live in this two-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment at Lawrence Road. The interior design of this abode is enhanced and made cozier with the carpeted floors. With this home's abundant storage space, including the wall-to-wall closet, housekeeping will become more manageable. Indulge in the great features of this apartment that has a well-equipped kitchen with refrigerator, gas range, and garbage disposal. Select homes also have a dishwasher and microwave added. After a long day, you can hang out on your private deck for some relaxation. Make this community your next home and enjoy the thoughtful list of amenities such as covered parking spaces, a clubhouse, and a laundry facility. Call today, the friendly staff will be glad to welcome you for your visit! OFFICE HOURS:Tuesday:   9:00am to 6:00pm    Wednesday:   9:00am to 6:00pm    Thursday:   9:00am to 6:00pm    Friday:   9:00am to 6:00pm    Saturday:   9:00am to 6:00pm     FLOORPLAN/UNIT AMENITIES:  * 1st Floor  PROPERTY AMENITIES:  * Large Playground  * Fitness Center  * Barbecue Area  * Covered Parking  * 2 On-site Laundry Facilities Website: http://www.lawrenceroadapts.comOnline Leasing URL: http://www.lawrenceroadapts.com/Floor-plans.aspx  CALL US TODAY!   show contact info
